
enable-alarm-actions
********************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Enables actions for the specified alarms.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws cloudwatch enable-alarm-actions
     --alarm-names <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--alarm-names"  (list of string)
   The names of the alarms to enable actions for.

   *Parameter Syntax*

      ["string", ...]


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
